# Draft:PDWARE Resource Management & Portfolio Optimization Software

----
}}
PDWare (Portfolio Decisionware, Inc.) is an American software company based in New York City. It develops and sells project and resource management software.
The companyâ€™s main product, ResourceFirst, is a web-based application for portfolio and resource management. PDWare lists its headquarters in New York City.
